Experience family serenity in this immaculately updated 3 bedroom plus study and 2 bathroom home with own gate into the Nangathan Way Reserve. In a quiet court on 759 m² (approx.), it’s near transport, Luther College, Yarra Rd Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar and McAdam Square. There’s off street parking for your van plus a large remote double garage with storage. Exquisite landscaped gardens and a feature entry present a sunny, split-level design showcasing 2 big living zones, garden views, modern décor, storage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and 2 split systems. The tranquil parents’ wing boasts a formal lounge/dining, study and large master with WIR and spotless ensuite (twin vanities). A children’s wing has 2 bedrooms (BIRs), a lovely bathroom and laundry with storage. Carefree cooking awaits in the gourmet, soft-close kitchen featuring updated s/s appliances, dishwasher and superb storage. Enjoy treed views from the bay window dining nook, family room and roofed entertainer’s deck (bistro blinds). A private, easy-care landscaped garden with built-in trampoline, veggies, shed and water storage will thrill children and parents.

Description:
Prestige lifestyle home with exceptional views in quiet bush setting
Upon an elevated 1,705 sq m approx. block of pristine Australian bush, this serene, one-owner house is a masterpiece of design, quality and timeless style, exhibiting breathtaking scenic views from the highest point in Metropolitan Melbourne. The living areas and bedrooms each enjoy access to a wraparound merbau balcony, featuring a north-east oriented alfresco entertaining area with mood lighting. It's from this balcony you'll experience widespread views encompassing Kinglake, Eltham Tower, the Macedon Ranges and the CBD. Stunning sunsets and twinkling lights at night provide a lifestyle to enjoy.
West Australian Jarrah floorboards grace the top level, comprising elegant lounge and dining rooms adorned with high ceilings, roses and corbelled arches. A family room with an open fireplace adjoins the WA Jarrah kitchen, complete with granite countertops, a walk-in pantry and stainless-steel appliances including a pyrolytic oven.
Three upstairs double bedrooms have triple built-in wardrobes and share a family bathroom. The upstairs large master bedroom contains a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite with spa. All upper level living areas and bedrooms have sliding door balcony access. The semi-self-contained lower level contains a living/rumpus room, robed bedroom and a bathroom with separate toilet.
Additional luxuries include: gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar panels, ducted vacuum, surround sound wiring, a monitored alarm system, ample storage, quality double roller blinds and internal access to a triple garage.
This exclusive tree lined street is perfectly positioned within close proximity to buses, Good Shepherd Primary School/Luther College and McAdam Square and is accessible to Yarra Valley Grammar, Croydon Hills Primary School and Croydon's station, cafes and shopping.
- Single-owner house with awe-inspiring views
- 1705 sq m approx. of pristine Australian bush
- Jarrah floorboards and kitchen cabinetry, stainless steel appliances
- Semi self-contained ground level accommodation
- Open fireplace, ducted heating and evap cooling
- Near Luther College, McAdam Square and Yarra Valley Grammar
Terms: 10% deposit, balance negotiable
